roleset.name: hostile behavior
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: Where 's the public outcry about Russian veto and unilateralism -LRB- a criticism routinely employed - rightly - against the United States when it vetoes resolutions on Israeli aggression -RRB- ?

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Jan Faull, M.Ed., answers a parent's question about a firstborn toddler's aggression toward the new baby.

example.name: arg2
example.text: Some dogs may only show aggression over one specific object and nothing else.
example.arg: over one specific object and nothing else
